text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! jab tumase kaha jae ki majalison mein jagah kushaada kar de, to kushaadagee paida kar do. allaah tumhaare lie kushaadagee paida karega. aur jab kaha jae ki uth jao, to uth jaaya karo. tumamen se jo log eemaan lae hai aur unhen gyaan pradaan kiya gaya hai, allaah unake darajon ko uchchata pradaan karega. jo kuchh tum karate ho allaah usakee pooree khabar rakhata hai
